cs35013s.view

Class A_View<_VIEW_ extends A_View<?,?>,_DESCRIPTOR_ extends A_DescriptorHorizontal<?,?,?,?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • cs35013s.view.A_View<_VIEW_,_DESCRIPTOR_>
  • Type Parameters:
    _VIEW_ - - the view type
    _DESCRIPTOR_ - - the descriptor type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    A_ViewVertical, ViewTop

    public abstract class A_View<_VIEW_ extends A_View<?,?>,_DESCRIPTOR_ extends A_DescriptorHorizontal<?,?,?,?>>
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener
    Defines the shared elements of a view, where the horizontal axis is latitude or longitude, and the vertical axis is latitude or altitude, as defined by the subclasses.
    Author:
    Dan Tappan [05.05.13]
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • mapToWorld

        protected abstract cs35013s.datatype.CoordinateWorld3D mapToWorld(java.awt.Point point)
        Maps a two-dimensional pixel coordinate on this view to its corresponding three-dimensional world coordinate. The missing dimension defaults to zero.
        Parameters:
        point - - the pixel coordinate
        Returns:
        the world coordinate
